content: gVisit Moz News By: Rand Fishkin August 21, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin August 21, 2005 gVisit Moz News The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. gVisit is a tool that you can install on your site to see where the last 20-100 visitors to your site came from geographically. It's nothing sophisticated, but it is another example of a site using Google's map API to create something unique, and building on the success of Google's map interface and the company's popularity with the tech community. I expect to see dozens, if not hundreds more apps like this in the near future. Now, let's all watch and see if Google sandboxes the site thanks to all the links they're getting. :) Copied!
